title: What exactly is a "champion permanent"?
body:
I have been waiting to get a champion shard so I can upgrade to mastery 7 without having to use BE.
But now that I have it, I realize it doesn't work.

Googling revealed that a champion permanent is what you get by rerolling three shards into a permanent - yet rerolling shards was removed from the game.

So what is a champion permanent now?

replies.body:
Leftovers from the old system, i imagine.

You can use shards for both 6 and 7.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JE5RWfVe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-01T01:37:37.741+0000)
>
> Leftovers from the old system, i imagine.
> 
> You can use shards for both 6 and 7.

Thankfully I still can use the shard, I clicked on the wrong one by accident and was wondering why my shard didn't count as a permanent.
